messages.subject: Unschooly movie
messages.msgSnippet: We saw Nim s Island this weekend, and were very pleasantly surprised to find that the main character is an unschooled child.  She calls it islandschooled.
messages.messageBody:
We saw Nim's Island this weekend, and were very pleasantly surprised to find that the main
character is an unschooled child. She calls it "islandschooled." It was a pretty good movie--
both kids loved it, and loved seeing an unschooled child as a main character instead of
another movie about children constantly referencing school.

Joanna
